question: If a person logs on to healthcare.gov to make a change will they automatically be routed to Pennie?
text:
If a person logs on to healthcare.gov to make a change will they automatically be routed to Pennie?
          
        
NO, customers who login to their Healthcare.gov will still be able to access their account until the end of the year. If a customer logs in to their Healthcare.gov account on November 1
st
 to shop for plan year 2021 they will be directed to Pennie to apply, shop, and enroll in coverage.
